alert.note: Alert for Bastrop (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 11 at 7:03PM CDT until July 11 at 7:45PM CDT by NWS Austin-San Antonio
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 745 PM CDT FOR EAST CENTRAL BASTROP COUNTY... At 703 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Circle D-KC Estates, or near Bastrop, and is nearly stationary. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Bastrop, Smithville, Camp Swift, Paige, Circle D-KC Estates, Upton, Bastrop State Park, Hills Prairie, Buescher State Park and Alum Creek. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
